int main()
{
  priority_queue<
    pair<int, int>,
    vector<pair<int, int>>,
    greater<pair<int, int>>>
    q;
  q.push({1, 1});
  q.push({2, 2});
  q.push({0, 3});
  q.push({9, 4});
  while (!q.empty()) {
    cout << q.top() << endl;
    q.pop();

}

#include <complex>        // std::complex
#include <iostream>       // std::cout/endl
#include <unordered_map>  // std::unordered_map

using namespace std;

namespace std {

template <typename T>
struct hash<complex<T>> {
  size_t
  operator()(const complex<T>& v) const
    noexcept
  {
    hash<T> h;
    return h(v.real()) + h(v.imag());
  }
};

}  // namespace std

  unordered_map<complex<double>,
                double>
    umc{{{1.0, 1.0}, 1.4142},
        {{3.0, 4.0}, 5.0}};
  cout << umc << endl;
}
